column5: Made it to the river around 7am, pretty cold and frosty down by the river.  Got into a hole pile of these little guys...  http://i867.photobucket.com/albums/ab236/lovetofish123/2012-04-29090248.jpg  http://i867.photobucket.com/albums/ab236/lovetofish123/536423_10150859998505351_589895350_12163307_1019983736_n.jpg  http://i867.photobucket.com/albums/ab236/lovetofish123/2012-04-29090323.jpg  All fish were caught beside or underneath fallen trees, on salmon roe.  Maybe because the water was so clear?  A little bigger...  http://i867.photobucket.com/albums/ab236/lovetofish123/2012-04-29110650.jpg  We also walked up on a huge dead turkey!  http://i867.photobucket.com/albums/ab236/lovetofish123/2012-04-29092134.jpg   Some scenery pics...  http://i867.photobucket.com/albums/ab236/lovetofish123/545672_10150859995375351_589895350_12163288_345346752_n.jpg  http://i867.photobucket.com/albums/ab236/lovetofish123/529972_10150859997655351_589895350_12163305_1000113658_n.jpg  http://i867.photobucket.com/albums/ab236/lovetofish123/522849_10150859996290351_589895350_12163296_773567873_n.jpg  Turned out to be a pretty nice day!  http://i867.photobucket.com/albums/ab236/lovetofish123/545983_10150859994350351_589895350_12163284_162450737_n.jpg  It was a great day, caught some fish and we walked and walked and walked.  Some of you will probably recognize where we were and there was a lot of people there!  Tight Lines  LTF
Good job LTF    It always fun catching regardless the size of fish
Thanks Troutjunkie!  Are all those little trout rainbows?
Steelhead smolts...  If you get into a bunch of them it's wise to move to a different run/drift.
Nice reel. How do you like it?
Ive never seen a reel like that.:whistling:It looks like it catches more fish than mine! lol. Great day for sure.
Thats not my reel! My buddies first season with a float reel. He did pretty well though, got his first fish on it!
